title: Who runs Iran now? An uncertain path to new supreme leader after Khamenei’s death.
summary_full: Iran’s constitution calls for an assembly of experts to choose the next supreme leader, but that may not be possible in wartime.
summary_public: Iran’s constitution calls for an assembly of experts to choose the next supreme leader, but that may not be possible in wartime.

IR.label: positive
IR.evidence: uncertain path to new supreme leader after Khamenei’s death
